intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to download and install CA certificates into g-Eclipse.

item.title: Open the CA Certificates Dialog Box
item.description: Go to Window > Preferences, expand the g-Eclipse sub-tree and select CA Certificates. You can click the Click to Perform button to have the Preferences dialog box open automatically.

item.title: Add CA Certificates
item.description:
To add certificates from a repository, click on
Add from Repository.... This will open the Certificate Import Wizard. There you may select a certificate loader and click Next. On the next wizard page you may enter the URL of the repository that should be queried for available certificates. After clicking Next the certificates contained in the specified repository are listed and displayed on the next wizard page. There you can select the certificates you would like to import and click Finish. The various certificates will be downloaded, unzipped and installed.
